Reentrancy in ReservedTokensFinalizeAgent.distributeReservedTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0x4d49849dcc51ea1675140cb007d9f6897ae53260.sol#1559-1588):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(distributedReservedTokensDestinationsLen < token.reservedTokensDestinationsLen()) (/unique_chucks/9/0x4d49849dcc51ea1675140cb007d9f6897ae53260.sol#1565-1568)
	- i < crowdsale.joinedCrowdsalesLen() (/unique_chucks/9/0x4d49849dcc51ea1675140cb007d9f6897ae53260.sol#1572-1578)
	- batch = token.reservedTokensDestinationsLen().minus(distributedReservedTokensDestinationsLen) (/unique_chucks/9/0x4d49849dcc51ea1675140cb007d9f6897ae53260.sol#1581-1585)
	- reservedAddr = token.reservedTokensDestinations(j) (/unique_chucks/9/0x4d49849dcc51ea1675140cb007d9f6897ae53260.sol)
	- allocatedBonusInTokens = token.getReservedTokens(reservedAddr) (/unique_chucks/9/0x4d49849dcc51ea1675140cb007d9f6897ae53260.sol)
	- percentsOfTokensUnit = token.getReservedPercentageUnit(reservedAddr) (/unique_chucks/9/0x4d49849dcc51ea1675140cb007d9f6897ae53260.sol)
	- percentsOfTokensDecimals = token.getReservedPercentageDecimals(reservedAddr) (/unique_chucks/9/0x4d49849dcc51ea1675140cb007d9f6897ae53260.sol)
	- token.mint(reservedAddr,allocatedBonusInPercentage) (/unique_chucks/9/0x4d49849dcc51ea1675140cb007d9f6897ae53260.sol)
	- token.mint(reservedAddr,allocatedBonusInTokens) (/unique_chucks/9/0x4d49849dcc51ea1675140cb007d9f6897ae53260.sol)
	- token.finalizeReservedAddress(reservedAddr) (/unique_chucks/9/0x4d49849dcc51ea1675140cb007d9f6897ae53260.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- distributedReservedTokensDestinationsLen (/unique_chucks/9/0x4d49849dcc51ea1675140cb007d9f6897ae53260.sol)

	- distributedReservedTokensDestinationsLen == token.reservedTokensDestinationsLen() (/unique_chucks/9/0x4d49849dcc51ea1675140cb007d9f6897ae53260.sol)

CrowdsaleExt.getState (/unique_chucks/9/0x4d49849dcc51ea1675140cb007d9f6897ae53260.sol#858-876) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/9/0x4d49849dcc51ea1675140cb007d9f6897ae53260.sol#874-876)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/9/0x4d49849dcc51ea1675140cb007d9f6897ae53260.sol#874-876)
